meanings.definition: (adj.) Used as an intensifier to express extreme anger or frustration.
meanings.sent1: I am so motherfucking mad at my brother for breaking my toy.
meanings.sent2: She was motherfucking furious when she found out she missed the bus.
meanings.sent3: The motherfucking printer decided to jam right before my important presentation.
meanings.sent4: The motherfucking storm outside matched the rage I felt inside.
meanings.sent5: His motherfucking scream echoed through the house, scaring everyone.

meanings.definition: (adv.) Used to intensify a statement or command.
meanings.sent1: He ran motherfucking fast to catch the bus before it left.
meanings.sent2: She motherfucking told him to stop playing and come to dinner.
meanings.sent3: The cat motherfucking leaped onto the table to steal a bite of chicken.
meanings.sent4: The news spread motherfucking quickly through the small town.
meanings.sent5: The music blared motherfucking loud at the concert, making everyone dance.
